document_data.name: Tharen Nhalass
document_data.siblings: [[Umathar Nhalass VI|Umathar VI]]</br>[[Rhendar Nhalass II|Rhendar II]]</br>[[Sharath Nhalass|Sharath]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharren Nhalass''' was the thirteenth [[Arkhan (title)|Arkhan]] of the [[Nhalass Dynasty]] to rule the nation of [[Raumathar]].
document_data.Activities: Tharren inherited the throne when his older brother, [[Rhendar Nhalass II|Rhendar II]], was slain by [[demon]]s sent by [[Narfell]]. Tharren met the same fate and was killed during his first year as Arkhan in {{Yearlink|-605}}.
document_data.Relationships: Tharren was the fourth son of [[Darthen Nhalass III]]. His eldest brother died with their father while invading Narfell. His next oldest brother was Rhendar II, and his younger brother was [[Sharath Nhalass|Sharath]].
